title: Increase Gmail contact card size while maintaining single-line layout

requirements.text: Increase the font size and overall dimensions of the Gmail contact card (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[9]/div[1]/div[2]/a[4]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]) in the ContactSection component while ensuring the email address fits on one line without wrapping or overflow

quotes: increase the size of the gmail but in one line it should fit

acceptanceCriteria: The Gmail contact card displays with increased font size compared to current implementation
The email address remains on a single line without text wrapping
The card maintains proper spacing and alignment with other contact cards
Text does not overflow the card boundaries

constraints: Modify only the Gmail contact card element identified by the XPath
Preserve the existing glassmorphism styling and hover effects
Maintain responsive behavior across different screen sizes
nonGoals: Modifying other contact cards (Name, Phone, WhatsApp, Instagram)
Changing the overall ContactSection layout or structure
